DOC.brief_summary: Women who are to undergo their first Cesarean and have cervical dilatation 5 cm or more are randomized to having the hysterotomy 2 cm below or above the bladder insertion on the uterus. They are followed up with a transvaginal scan of the uterus 6 - 9 months after the Cesarean to assess the appearance of the Cesarean scar in the uterus.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Hysterotomy Technique on the Rate of Large Defects in the Hysterotomy Scar
DOC.criteria: No previous caesarean 5 cm cervical dilatation at least 18 years old
